title: The soaring number of refugees from the war is increasing disquiet in Europe.
dc:creator: Erika Solomon and Monika Pronczuk

media:content.media:credit: Laetitia Vancon for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Anastasia Orchenita, 33, who is from Mariupol, Ukraine, and her two children at a refugee camp in Germany. Officials say they are overwhelmed by the arrival Ukrainians and some 80,000 other asylum seekers.
